verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:29
verses.text: And of the children of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of the house of Saul.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:30
verses.text: And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the house of their fathers.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:31
verses.text: And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were expressed by name, to come and make David king.
